Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is truly exceptional and offers a wide range of benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $150 for it. I'm confident that this investment will pay off in terms of the value it brings to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
